sellerOnboarding.title: Become a Seller
sellerOnboarding.professionalDescription: Verified business account for watch dealers and authorized retailers
sellerOnboarding.privateDescription: Individual account for watch enthusiasts selling from personal collection
sellerOnboarding.businessVerificationDescription: Please provide documentation to verify your business
sellerOnboarding.ownershipDescription: Verify that you own the watch you're listing
sellerOnboarding.boxPapersDescription: Do you have the original box and papers?
sellerOnboarding.yesBoxPapers: Yes, I have box and papers
sellerOnboarding.priceAdjustment: Price will be adjusted for market value without box and papers
sellerOnboarding.verificationDescription: Your documentation is being reviewed. This typically takes 24-48 hours.
sellerOnboarding.verifiedDescription: Your account has been verified. You can now list watches for sale.

subscription.title: Upgrade to Premium
subscription.planDescription: Select the plan that fits your needs

listWatch.title: List a Watch
listWatch.guaranteeDescription: I guarantee this watch is authentic

watchAnalysis.disclaimer: This analysis is provided for informational purposes only. For definitive authentication, please consult a certified watch appraiser or authorized dealer.

errors.analysisGeneric: Failed to analyze watch. Please try again.
errors.emptyImage: The image appears to be empty. Please take or select another photo.
errors.imageProcessing: Failed to process the image. Please try a different photo.
errors.networkIssue: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.timeout: Analysis is taking too long. Please try again.
errors.noImageSelected: No image was selected. Please try again.

camera.alignDial: Position the dial inside the circle
camera.fillFrame: Fill the frame with the watch dial
camera.makeDialVisible: Make sure the entire dial is visible and in focus
camera.tip1: Ensure good lighting for best results
camera.tip1Detail: Use natural daylight or bright indoor lighting. Avoid dark shadows on the dial.
camera.tip2: Keep the watch flat and fill the frame
camera.tip2Detail: Hold steady and fill 70-80% of the circle with the watch face. Keep the camera parallel to the dial.
camera.tip3Detail: Tilt slightly to reduce glare. Crystal should be clean and scratch-free for best detection.
camera.quickTip: Tip: Fill the circle with the watch dial for best results
camera.errorNotDetected: Could not detect the watch. Please ensure the watch dial is clearly visible, well-lit, and fills most of the frame. Try again with better lighting.
camera.errorBlurry: The image appears blurry or unclear. Please hold steady and ensure the watch is in focus before capturing.
camera.errorTimeout: Analysis took too long. Please try again with a clearer, well-lit image of the watch.
camera.permissionDescription: We need access to your camera to scan and identify watches.
camera.useLibrary: Please use the photo library option on web.
camera.checkImageTips: Make sure the watch dial is clearly visible, well-lit, and fills most of the frame for best results.
